content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In connection with your work related to the Invitae account (“Client”), you may have access to personal data and health and medical information stored on Client's networks and computer systems or otherwise possessed by Client (for purpose of this Addendum, “Protected Health Information”).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You acknowledge and agree that all your obligations and promises regarding treatment of personal data set forth in the NON-DISCLOSURE OBLIGATION FORM REGARDING INFORMATION CONTAINING PERSONAL DATA you signed in connection with your employment with EPAM shall extend to Protected Health Information that you may have access to in the course of your work related to Client.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In addition\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"to the obligations set forth in the NON-DISCLOSURE OBLIGATION FORM REGARDING INFORMATION CONTAINING PERSONAL DATA, and not in place of any such obligations, you furthermore reaffirm the following:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You understand that both EPAM and you are under contractual obligations to safeguard and protect against disclosure of Protected Health Information you may have access to through your work on the Client account.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You understand that in addition to these contractual obligations, local and extra-territorial laws may also apply, requiring you to safeguard and protect against disclosure of Protected Health Information, for example potentially the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act of 1966 and regulations related thereto (“HIPAA”).\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You understand that you will not be permitted to perform work related to Client's account unless you agree to and comply with the obligations set forth in this Addendum.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You agree that you will only use and disclose Protected Health Information for authorized tasks related to carrying out work required by the Client, and will not access such information beyond the scope of the authorized tasks.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You agree to maintain the security and privacy of all Protected Health Information and to not disclose such information except as expressly permitted by this Addendum.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You agree that you will not use photographic equipment while performing services relative to Client's account absent express written approval by your manager. This shall include any device that records sounds, videos or images.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You agree you will not disclose any sign-on code or password or use any other individual's sign-on code or password to access Protected Health Information.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You agree you will not leave a secured application with access to Protected Health Information unattended while logged on.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You agree to immediately report to your manager any unauthorized or inadvertent use or disclosure of Protected Health Information by you or by any other individual of which you become aware.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You agree that upon the end of your work on the Client account, or the end of your need to have access to Protected Health Information, whichever is sooner, you will return all Protected Health Information to your manager, and will not retain any copies.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You agree you will comply with all other EPAM policies in effect relative to confidentiality and data security in connection with your access to Protected Health Information\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You agree that in the case of breach of these obligations, you may be subject to disciplinary action (including up to termination of employment) as well as be held liable for any damages you may have caused, and for any violations of applicable law you may have engaged in.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}]}]}}"
